name: TREBOR (most recent)
description:
In Trebor you will play as a frog named Trebor, who is embarking on a journey to the top of a mysterious rocky mountain inhabited by sentiment rock platforms called Geols. We took the brief ‘unstable’ and decided that each platform can be broken by Trebor’s tremendous ability to crumble rock as he blasts from the ground. Be careful not to sabotage your ascent by using Trebor’s ability too flippantly. Objective is to reach the top and use Trebor’s ability to defeat the Geol Guardian that resides there.

Space = Jump 

R = Restart  

M = Mute
